page.title: 07Rogart - Lifestyle (Fleet)
page.content: The Fleet is a river which flows through the Rogart valley. It has existed since the Ice Age. It is a very clean river and has many salmon, brown trout and sea-trout in its waters. The river has a good Angling Club. Any person over the age of eighteen, who is interested in fishing, can join by contacting Mr Angus, at the Rogart Hotel. You can fish on six days of the week - it being illegal to do so on Sunday. The fishing season for the Fleet is from the 1st of June to the 30th September. There are other local rules and these are explained when you join the Angling Club. An annual membership fee of Â£2 per head must be paid.
